charity.title: Charity
charity.subtitle: Every donation will be recorded on the blockchain to ensure transparency and traceability
charity.blockchainTransparency: Every donation will be recorded on the blockchain to ensure transparency and traceability
charity.loveTransmission: Let love spread and make the world a better place
charity.daoAidSubtitle: From proposal, voting, fundraising to execution and feedback, every step is transparent and verifiable on-chain.
charity.step1Desc: When disasters or urgent needs occur in any region, any DAO member can initiate a proposal on-chain, publicly describing the aid background and plan.
charity.step2Desc: After proposal publication, global community members will vote on the proposal on-chain. Results are transparent and immutable, ensuring every vote is authentic and valid.
charity.step3Desc: After voting approval, the system enters the global fundraising phase. Users can donate using stablecoins or tokens, with all funds entering the smart contract treasury, ensuring transparent processes.
charity.step4Desc: After fundraising completion, the DAO allocates funds according to the proposal content through multi-signature wallets or automatic contract funding, ensuring precise delivery to beneficiaries.
charity.step5Desc: After aid completion, proposers must submit fund usage and aid outcome reports, with all materials stored on-chain, forming a complete transparent aid cycle.
charity.startCharity: Start your charity journey and contribute to a better world
charity.transparencyDesc: All donation records are on-chain, ensuring transparent fund flows
charity.globalParticipationDesc: No borders, enabling global users to participate in charity
charity.loveTransmissionDesc: Every donation is a transmission of love, making the world better
charity.point3Desc: Blockchain can not only raise funds, but also make charity funds continuously appreciate through DeFi, staking, NFT, RWA and other models:
charity.point3List1: Charity fund pools can conduct low-risk DeFi investments, making funds 'liquid' and generating continuous returns.
charity.point3List2: Donors can obtain on-chain credential NFTs, which not only prove charitable acts, but also serve as identity markers and even participate in metaverse charity activities.
charity.point3List3: Future RWA (Real World Assets on-chain) can link some donations with real projects, such as education loans, green energy, etc., achieving a win-win situation of charity + investment.
charity.point4Desc: Traditional charity is often plagued by cross-border financial systems, foreign exchange restrictions, and inefficiency. Blockchain naturally has the advantage of global settlement:
charity.point4List1: A donation can reach beneficiaries' wallets from the US to Africa and Southeast Asia in minutes.
charity.point4List3: Enable global aid to reach any corner of the world as long as there is internet.
charity.point4Conclusion: This means blockchain has the potential to become the underlying financial infrastructure for global charity.
charity.point5Desc: Young people are more willing to participate in charity through Web3 tools:
charity.point5List1: They are accustomed to using wallets, exchanges, and NFT markets.
charity.point5List2: They have higher acceptance of on-chain governance and token incentives.
charity.point5List3: 'Doing charity while gaining on-chain identity and profit proof' will become an important motivation to attract them.
charity.point5Conclusion: This will deeply integrate charity with trend culture and crypto economy, forming a new generation charity ecosystem.
charity.point6Desc: In the future, governments, the United Nations and other international organizations may also adopt blockchain as a standard tool for charity fund supervision and distribution.
charity.point6List3: Make global charity gradually move towards openness, standardization, and credibility.
charity.conclusionIntro: The development prospects of blockchain charity are:
charity.conclusionFinal: In the next decade, blockchain will not only be a financial tool, but more likely become global charity infrastructure, truly putting 'love consensus' on-chain, forming a human charity network that transcends national boundaries, cultures, and time.
